The current next_point behavior causes ICE on multibyte character: #80134
If my understanding on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/80185#issuecomment-748483804 is correct, the width detection is weird and will be 1 anyway (since find_width_of_character_at_span returns 1 when hi == lo)
it'd be great if we could fix this behavior to point to multibyte character correctly, any thoughts?
